title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems this is inred text.
OB: When choosing the project name to be 'test' in the Copy Project dialog, a static text validation error appears on the dialog.
EB: After cleaning the project (F2) and creating a new project named 'test', the following issues occur in the Copy Project dialog:
SR:
1. When the 'Use Default Location' option is checked, the user should still be able to select and view the default location or copy it from the edit box below.
2. The user should be able to choose a path close to the default location if desired.
3. Provide steps to reproduce the issue.
